item.title: whoami?
item.description: ❓ IntroductionI am a former cyberdefense student at ENSIBS and currently working as Threat Hunter for WithSecure. My favorite infosec fields are OSINT, pentest, forensics and malware analysis. 💻 Infosec, or about 80% of my lifeBeing passionate about computer security, I practice during my free time various activities in the field. Currently, I’m heavily learning and practicing malware analysis as I’m now the happy owner of a Binary Ninja licence 😎.
